post.body: The Little Rascals box set contains a detailed listing of all the Rascals who died early, tragic deaths. Now, time to laugh!!
Tomorrow, I find out if I am indeed bipolar2. All signs point to mother-effin YES, bobdammit!!!
In the process of jettisoning 'friends' who can't respond to news that isn't positive or doesn't somehow relate to them. congrats on ur ...
The Great Derangement: A Terrifying True Story of War, Politics, and Religion at the Twilight of the American Empire http://ff.im/-sGXb
reading The Great Derangement: A Terrifying True Story of War, Politics, and Religion at the Twilight of the American Empire
want to read: Hog and Hominy: Soul Food from Africa to America
Tivoing The Awful Truth and working on my Ralph Bellamy.
The Twilight Zone tweets by Paul F. Tompkins = first big laugh of 2009. Thanks, famous person!
Hey, nerds. The Statistical Abstract for 2009 http://www.census.gov/compendia/statab/
Eating what my nephew used to refer to as a "handy cane". Happy New Year's to those who are still in 2008, and everyone else.
Ha! Joe "Don't ask me about the dead Congressional aide" Scarborough and Zbigniew Brzezinski http://www.msnbc.msn.com/id/8004316/
took the long-ass Minnesota Multiphasic Personality test today
Have been playing around with Tumblr. tobey.tumblr.com
So happy Wes Welker made the Pro Bowl. Love that scrappy, hustlin emmer-effer
Searchme.com is addictive.

Just realized I napped through the bulk of the Celtics game!
There are literally dozens of pounds of candy in the house, but my eye is on the last piece of bread pudding. There will be blood.
